original_text: A terrible thing is happening in the land of Judah. A terrible thing is happening in the land of Judah.
korean_text: 이 땅에 무섭고 놀라운 일이 있도다

sentences.original_text: A terrible thing is happening in the land of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 땅에서 끔찍한 일이 일어나고 있습니다
